name: SWEPT - Classic Game Challenge
description:
Sweep rows, sweep columns!

SWEPT is original puzzle game designed with slogan “Style and Simplicity”. The visuals are inspired by suprematist ideas of avant-garde artists, worked out at the beginning of 20th century.

Build the same clashing rows in both boxes by sweeping its rows and columns.
Build more than one pair of equal rows at a time for higher points.

Learn the art of puzzle suprematism in the fresh waves of entertainment revolution.
Join cubist movement uniting cubes of the same colors.

Black, white or red - change the look of things to reach new prospects.

No price, no in-App Purchases - just play it FREE and have fun!

Video of gameplay: http://youtu.be/tseTrxv5pk4

Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/pages/SWEPT/288650231294399
